com.conceptwave.scripting
Class WorklistItem

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject
          com.conceptwave.scripting.WorklistItem

public class WorklistItem
extends CwObject

The user's worklist is a set of worklist items. Each worlist item allows to access the worklist table document, the order for this worklist item and the process document of the process that waits for the given operation.
